revised_title: Phenyl Compounds: New Discoveries and Properties
tldr: The author, A. Williamson, discusses new compounds of phenyl, including the formation of phosphate of phenyl, a beautiful product in organic chemistry. The author also explores the reactions and properties of various phenyl compounds, such as chloride of phenyl, acetate of phenyl, and cyanide of phenyl. These discoveries expand our understanding of phenyl chemistry and its potential applications.
